body_html:
@reedwm I have never had this issue happen to me on PyTorch or Torch, either by me not closing the session properly or just killing the process. So I think this is more of a bug on the tensorflow side.

Edit: When I mean session: I mean both logging out, as well as a tensorflow session itself.

body:
@reedwm I have never had this issue happen to me on PyTorch or Torch, either by me not closing the session properly or just killing the process. So I think this is more of a bug on the tensorflow side.

**Edit**: When I mean session: I mean both logging out, as well as a tensorflow session itself.
